Class ShowroomsViewController

java.lang.Object
com.example.theaterproject.Controllers.ShowroomsViewController
public class ShowroomsViewController extends Object
Controller for the showrooms view.

Manages the display and interaction with showroom cards in a grid layout. Provides navigation to other views and handles showroom creation/editing. Automatically updates the grid when showrooms are added, modified, or removed.

    • ShowroomsViewController

      public ShowroomsViewController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the showrooms view. Populates the grid with showroom cards and adds a listener to update the grid when showrooms change.

    • onHomeViewButtonClick

      private void onHomeViewButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent pEvent)
      Handles the "Home View" button click event. Navigates back to the editor view (movies view).
      Parameters:
      pEvent - the action event triggered by the button

    • onStatsViewButtonClick

      private void onStatsViewButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent pEvent)
      Handles the "Stats View" button click event. Navigates to the statistics view.
      Parameters:
      pEvent - the action event triggered by the button

    • onAddButtonClick

      private void onAddButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent pEvent)
      Handles the "Add" button click event. Opens a dialog to create a new showroom.
      Parameters:
      pEvent - the action event triggered by the button

    • openShowroomAddEditView

      private void openShowroomAddEditView(Showroom pShowroom)
      Opens the showroom add/edit dialog.
      Parameters:
      pShowroom - the showroom to edit, or null to create a new showroom

    • fillShowroomGridPane

      private void fillShowroomGridPane()
      Populates the grid pane with showroom cards. Clears existing cards and creates new ones for all showrooms in the service.

    • addShowroomCard

      private void addShowroomCard(Showroom pShowroom, int pColumn, int pRow)
      Adds a showroom card to the grid at the specified position. Sets up a listener to update the card when the showroom's screenings change.
      Parameters:
      pShowroom - the showroom to display
      pColumn - the column position in the grid
      pRow - the row position in the grid

    • onSignOutButtonClick

      private void onSignOutButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent pEvent)
      Handles the sign out button click event. Opens the login view and closes the current window.
      Parameters:
      pEvent - the action event triggered by the sign out button
